title.narrative: Conference on Implications of the North African Uprisings for Sub-Saharan Africa

description.narrative:
The aim of this project is to conduct research on the implications of the North Africa Uprisings for Sub-Saharan Africa. The research will provide the foundation for the conduction of a conference on the topic with the intention to draw lessons-learned from recent developments and its potential implications for Sub-Saharan Africa. The expected outcomes are:
• Based on IAGs Concept Note “The North Africa Uprisings and Their Governance Implications for Sub-Saharan Africa” IAG will commission research papers testing assumptions and drawing lessons-learned from the North Africa Uprisings and discuss its potential implications for Sub-Saharan Africa. • The research will culminate in a conference on “The Implications of the North Africa Uprisings on Sub-Saharan Africa”, which is expected to take place in Nairobi (alternatively Juba) in February or March 2012. • Publish research papers to benefit academia and policy discussions.
